description:
Darkest of Days sends you from Ancient Rome, to the American Civil War, to World War 2 to protect the timestream by absolutely obliterating anything larger than a wristwatch with late 22nd century firepower. This time company is deranged.
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/mandaloregaming
Thumbnail and intro art by @sneksucks 
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore
00:00 - Intro 
01:34 - Game Premise
04:03 - Visuals
09:40 - Music & Sound Design
15:04 - Gameplay Mechanics
23:06 - Story (SPOILERS)
29:51 - Conclusions
30:39 - Credits
31:46 - A Way with Words

#games #gaming #fps #darkestofdays #gamereview
title: Darkest of Days Review
